casebody.data:
2002-1680 (La. 10/14/02)

F. MILLER & SONS, INC. and Lake Charles Harbor & Terminal District v. CALCASIEU PARISH SCHOOL BOARD, Rufus Fruge, Jr. as Director of Calcasieu Parish Sales and Use Tax Dept., etc. And Other Consolidated Cases. No. 2002-C-1680. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Calcasieu Parish Sch. Bd. et al.; Fruge, Rufus Jr.; Calcasieu Parish Sales & Use Tax Dept. Etc.; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Calcasieu, 14th Judicial District Court Div. E, Nos. 98-6599, 99-8359, 2000-000268; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No(s). 02-00016, 02-00017, 02-00018.

Granted.
